data_sources.description: A set of images categorized into different flower classes for recognition tasks.

data_variables.name: train_ds
data_variables.description: Training dataset containing images and labels of flowers for training the model.

data_variables.name: val_ds
data_variables.description: Validation dataset containing images and labels of flowers for model evaluation.

data_variables.name: data_augmentation
data_variables.description: A sequential model for augmenting image data to improve the generalization of the model.

data_variables.name: model
data_variables.description: The neural network model created to classify flower images based on their features.

data_variables.name: history
data_variables.description: History object that stores the loss and accuracy metrics for each epoch during training.

data_flow.usage: Used for training the model during the fit() method.
Used for validation during the fit() method.
Applied to images during model creation within the make_model() function.
Compiled and then trained using fit(). The model is later saved to disk.

data_flow.creation: Generated by calling fit() on the model.
data_flow.usage: Used to plot training and validation loss and accuracy metrics.

models.architecture: Dense layers with dropout for regularization and softmax activation for multi-class classification.
models.target_variable: Categorical labels corresponding to flower classes.
